name: Music Mouse over wet paint - Study 1/7
description:
This is the first in a week long study of using Handsfree.js to use Music Mouse (https://teropa.info/musicmouse/) with hand tracking, while painting over the played path with p5.js. It is my first exploration into painting sonically. In this painting, the goal was to get a feel for how to play music through painting and not to create expressive music

This is an NFT of the final result, with my first name "OZ" overlaid on top and is a 687x659 cropped PNG

Links:
See the full session: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HIeiLOrXWa0
Hear what it sounds like when played with more intent: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QBf7RLrICwY
See the Handsfree Userscript source: https://gist.github.com/ArtSeeClarke/c40d73d0426c2bf2a62296fc72da6a48
